alert.note: Alert for Southeast Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued January 03 at 4:04AM EST until January 03 at 11:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 11 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...Southeast Suffolk County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 11 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Brief minor flooding of the more vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. MORICHES BAY AT EAST MORICHES NY MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 4.4 FT, MODERATE 5.4 FT, MAJOR 6.4 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.8 FT, MODERATE 2.8 FT, MAJOR 3.8 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 03/09 AM 3.7/ 4.2 1.1/ 1.6 1.2/ 1.7 1 NONE 03/09 PM 3.7/ 4.2 1.2/ 1.7 2.0/ 2.5 1 NONE 04/09 AM 4.2/ 4.7 1.6/ 2.0 1.7/ 2.2 1 MINOR 04/10 PM 3.0/ 3.5 0.4/ 0.9 1.2/ 1.7 0-1 NONE 05/10 AM 3.2/ 3.7 0.7/ 1.1 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE 05/11 PM 2.7/ 3.2 0.1/ 0.6 0.9/ 1.4 1 NONE SHINNECOCK BAY AT PONQUOQUE NY MLLW CATEGORIES -
